data

Class QualityDataAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.QualityDataAccess

  • public class QualityDataAccess
extends java.lang.Object
    This class accesses the database to add and retrieve quality checklist items.

      QualityDataAccess()

      This method connects to the database to retrieve checklist dates for a patient.

      This method connects to the database to retrieve accomplished checklist items for a patient.

      This method connects to the database to retrieve the most recent dates and items for accomplished checklist items for a patient.

      • saveChecklist

        public static boolean saveChecklist(int patientId,
                                    java.sql.Date thisDate,
                                    java.lang.String[] checklistItems,
                                    java.lang.String userName,
                                    int clinicId)
        This method connects to the database to save accomplished checklist items for a patient.
        Parameters:
        patientId - the patient ID
        checklistItems - the checklist items
        thisDate - the date
        userName - the user name
        clinicId - the clinic ID
        Returns:
        the boolean indicating the success or failure of the operation

      • getChecklistDates

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.sql.Date> getChecklistDates(int patientId)
        This method connects to the database to retrieve checklist dates for a patient.
        Parameters:
        patientId - the patient ID
        Returns:
        the list of checklist dates or null if results are missing

      • getChecklistItems

        public static java.util.ArrayList<QualityReference> getChecklistItems(int patientId,
                                                                      java.sql.Date date,
                                                                      int clinicId)
        This method connects to the database to retrieve accomplished checklist items for a patient.
        Parameters:
        patientId - the patient ID
        date - the date
        clinicId - the clinic ID
        Returns:
        the patient's list of checklist items or null if results are missing

      • getMostRecentChecklistItems

        public static java.util.ArrayList<CategoricalResult> getMostRecentChecklistItems(int patientId,
                                                                                 int clinicId)
        This method connects to the database to retrieve the most recent dates and items for accomplished checklist items for a patient.
        Parameters:
        patientId - the patient ID
        clinicId - the clinic ID
        Returns:
        the list of most recent checklist items for a patient or null if results are missing
